It was a ssd upgrade kit yet you didn’t give me the correct screwdriver for the hard drive bracket, the padded double stick tape was useless and the cables were either wrong or unnecessary. Maybe you sent the cables for a full sized magnetic drive rather than the ssd you sent me. There was nothing to hook up the temperature sensor so I have to use software.

Review.Titre: Took allot of time to finally figure…
Review.Contenu: Took allot of time to finally figure out where the product desired was located on the site.

Review.Titre: I paid for 2 day UPS service....
Review.Contenu: I paid for 2 day UPS service, signature required. UPS did not ring the for bell the day of delivery, left a delivery notice indicating the package would be dropped at a local business for pick up. the package wasn't dropped off till Jan 3 and when I went to pick it up the local pick up point did not ask for either my ID or signature. The drive in the order will be great to have, the shipping service left much to be desired.

Chaotic online shopAmerican service department that cannot operate in europe.Shipping announced through one operator then done with another.Paid express shipping charges but then shipped the normal way.bounce of responsibility.friendly operators but not willing to negotiate, or rather they make you believe there is a solution but then the boss says it is not possible....

Review.Titre: Screwed out of the main item I wanted to buy, had to buy an inferior product.
Review.Contenu: I was in the middle of trying to find another device when without warning the main item I wanted to buy disappeared out of my cart without any warning. I should have been given the opportunity to buy the item if it was being marketed to another person. I had to buy an inferior model (for less money). Very disappointed, as I worked on my purchase for the whole day.

Review.Titre: Offer cables to products you sell…
Review.Contenu: I purchased one of your Newertech Voyager external drive enclosures. Firstly, there is no description about if or what cables it comes with nor what cable(s) it needs!? I had to Google and search the makers website for answers. Since I'm on a new Mac, I'd need a USB-C adapter or USB-B to C cable. Kinda disappointed that you sell Mac everything, yet don't sell a simple USB-b to usb-c cable or adapter. Once again I had to Google that cable and purchase it elsewhere.

Everything went well until checkout when the website checkout didn't correspond to the password saved by the Mac OS system.  The name of the sites confused the password system and I had to create a new password.  I do not know if I purchased the OWC product or not.  Hopefully, I can check into OWC's website and confirm the purchase.  I have yet to receive a confirmation email receipt!

Review.Titre: Great job for OWC supporting 10 year…
Review.Contenu: Great job for OWC supporting 10 year old computers!  RAM was well priced and worked. My kit SSD upgrade kit for my iMac had all of the right tools for the job. The SSD temp sensor power wiring was a difficult fit with the drive bracket. My main issue with the items that I purchased: the SSD was not formatted.  I had to disassemble the computer and use a complex work around (SATA to USB adapter) to format the drive using my MacBook. After formatting: the SSD works great and was reasonably priced.

Review.Titre: It took three tries to actually get my…
Review.Contenu: It took three tries to actually get my order complete. I encountered problems with signing in to my account and requested assistance after the first attempt failed. Your representive seemed helpful but steered me wrong and I was unable to complete my order. After a wait of a few days, I tried again and was successful.

Review.Titre: No problem with the customer service…but had to pay return shipping.
Review.Contenu: No problem with the customer service person. It disappointed me to learn in the follow up email regarding a refund and return for a faulty piece of equipment that I had to pay the return shipping charges which totaled $15.00 with insurance for a two items in one box...blu ray player and free set of blu ray discs. Update...they did send a return shipping label and apologized. It was an error. Reimbursed me the shipping . Very nice. Great service

Review.Titre: What I want to do (get a newer iMac…
Review.Contenu: What I want to do (get a newer iMac with an upgraded OS and use my older iMac as a target display) according to Apple- after hours on the telephone with them - is not doable. I sure wish I had known this before I started this project.Edit: I hope this was not inartful.  I have had good experiences with OWC in years past. In this instance, however, neither OWC nor Apple's 'senior' tech support seemed to be able to understand the issue or formulate a correct solution.

Generally, please with the prices, though I see one of the items I purchased has gone down five dollars since I bought it four days ago.  But the service was disappointing when my shipment did not arrive even though tracking said it was delivered.  OWC wanted me to allow its tracing process to run its course, but did not offer to reverse the charges since I did not receive what I purchased.  Fortunately,I was able to persuade my mail carrier to search others’ mailboxes and my package was found in another’s mailbox

Review.Titre: Product was fine. Shipping has issues.
Review.Contenu: Product was fine, delivery on time, but OWC also sent me another person's product in MY Box. Well mistakes happen, but they wanted me to repackage and resend back to them, without offering anything in return. To my mind, that's not very good customer service. You could offer a discount coupon, percent off next purchase, something to compensate for their mistake. I sure hope they didn't make the other person wait for their product  until the one they sent me gets back, but wouldn't bet on it.

Review.Titre: MAC KEYBOARD CAME AND IT WAS BENT.
Review.Contenu: MAC KEYBOARD CAME AND IT WAS BENT.I KNOW IT WAS USED BUT I WAS SURPRISED TO SEE IT LIKE THAT. IT WAS SUPPOSE TO BE IN EXCELLENT CONDITION. I DID MANAGE TO APPLY SOME PRESSURE AND GET IT BACK TO SHAPE. I THOUGHT OF RETURNING BUT IT APPEARS TO BE OK .

The website failed to direct me to the Canadian website, and allowed my order to continue.  As a result, I have paid the equivalent of $30 USD more, and will now wait for an international package, instead of a free warehouse pickup.  Customer service was unwilling/unable to cancel the order from the US site after, even though the package has not yet shippedEdit:  Even after your reply to my review, the tracking number is invalid... all three tracking numbers you provided for my single item...the order has NOT shippedEDIT 2:  Adding a star because someone on the social media team reacted to my review, and was able to cancel the order.  This should have been accomplished at initial complaint, not after I had to resort to a bad review

Ordered 12-22-2022Got an email on 12-30 that my card wouldn't be charged till it was sent. The website says 1-3 days for a laptop, so even with the Christmas & NewYear's holidays, it has been way over 3 days. It is 1-9-2023. Still waiting.Update: Arrived 1-11-2023.

Review.Titre: There were several things that lowered…
Review.Contenu: There were several things that lowered the review rating. #1) Having been an OWC customer for many years I remember when customer support was more available and easy to access. #2) Shipping is not as good or inexpensive as B&H which is in NY. i would have thot shipping to the West coast from OWC would be faster and cheaper.#3) The lack of selection of non-OWC products is a problem. It doesn't give OWC customers a one stop shopping source.I still like OWC, its just that I think B&H is quicker, has a better selection, and is a bit better at customer service, although their depth of expertise is shallower. In the past OWC, although more expensive, was a pretty sure bet for technical support.I especially don't like what they are doing to SoftRAID support.

Review.Titre: I do not like your return policy
Review.Contenu: I do not like your return policy. If you ship me a dead drive, an RMA should trigger a replacement drive.  I shouldn't have to wait for shipping both direction.Edit:  This review is only for the return policy.  OWC is 5 star and I've worked with for over 3 decades.

From previous experiences, I know OWC is usually a 5-star company, but my recent experience was a little off. I bought a 2.0TB OWC Mercury Elite Pro mini which the website said would be shipped in 4 days. Six days later my order was still stuck in processing. While I was waiting, I looked into the warranty and discovered the SSD inside the Mini has a 5-year warranty, but that is reduced to 3-years if you buy it already installed in the OWC enclosure. Disappointing, so I canceled my order.

First, the good news:  The customer support is excellent.  I ordered RAM for my Apple G3 Power Mac.  Shipping was fast!Bad news:  The memory did not work...even though their site specifically indicated this memory was for the type computer I have.  The computer would not even start up.  My old memory worked fine, but not the new memory.Customer Service helped me troubleshoot some things, but we had no luck.  So....they are shipping out new RAM, and I should have it in a couple days.  I could not ask for better service!

Review.Titre: Website is as great as ever,Good, good, good, bad, good.
Review.Contenu: Website is as great as ever,prices are ok, quality and suitability of products is your strongest positive.As a European with a VAT number having the order process through another Euro country saves my cash flow big time, another positive.The card authentication experience was not good.Ultimately the order went through, so Happy Days!

While the configuration and ordering process were very smooth, I was a bit taken back by the packing and shipping. Protection was two sheets of crumpled paper in the box (original Apple box), with two sides unprotected. No signature was required. And. No power cord was in the included. I do have many UPC cables, but give me a break, that is a basic. I was not impressed by OWC attention to detail.

The shopping experience at OWC is always great, and until this MacBook battery, everything I've purchased has been excellent. However, this Newer battery for my 17" MacBook does not hold its charge, and it frequently loses the information stored in NVRAM, causing boot issues. 5 stars for always being good to work with, 1 star for a crappy product

Review.Titre: I own four owc flex 8 raids so I love…
Review.Contenu: I own four owc flex 8 raids so I love your productsI find it difficult to get to software raid "courses or manuals" - for example I am running Raid 7 on my machines but as I install my latest flex8 I can only find version 5 you tube Also when I ordered more software from you the screen to establish my account disappeared - I hd to hunt and peck to get back into creating an account as my original creation seems to have gone from your system

Fast and Professional with a large inventory.Edit - 6-5-23While unboxing my new Mac Mini I was checking specifications and found that my same exact setup was now $50 less.  The company does not honor the traditional 14 Day Price Guarantee like most of their  customer friendly competitors.  Removed two stars due to that unreasonable policy.

Review.Titre: It was difficult to get you to take my…
Review.Contenu: It was difficult to get you to take my money. I went to check out, then had to log in, and lost my order. Don’t know if it was processed or not. Website needs work! Wouldn’t take my CC info via copy and paste-had to type everything in-frustrating.

Ease of purchase. Though I it kept wanting to convert to a US order rather than Canadian. I can assume someone less tech savvy could get frustrated.Update: Sent in a message to support to ask about the status of my items. Got an initial reply that because I wasn't signed in the items won't appear in my account, when I responded and asked about an update. They went silent. No response in over a week. Sent a follow up message yesterday and haven't gotten a response.I thought since all my items were in stock and I paid extra for express shipping, that there would be some action, but I have no way of knowing.

Review.Titre: specs should be printed on the ram
Review.Contenu: pretty good overall but i was disappointed about one thingi was really impressed how easy it was to find the ram memory sticks i needed for my exact computer modelhowever i was disappointed that those exact specs were not clearly written on the ram sticksthey seem to be working so i am assuming that they are indeed the right ones that i orderedbut its a little frustrating that i had to sorta take that leap of faith and trust i got the right ones when it seems like it would be so simple to just have it written on there so i would have that extra confirmation i got the correct part

Review.Titre: You should accept foreign debit cards.
Review.Contenu: I had to use a friends US based credit card because my Philippine debit card would not work on your site. If you offer international shipping, you should accept foreign debit cards.Thanks for your response. I did check with my bank. They never saw a hit for the charges. The problem is on your end not with my bank.

Review.Titre: The computer arrived and it looks good, but...
Review.Contenu: The computer arrived and it looks good, but it came with no mouse and no keyboard.  So I have not been able to fire it up and check it out yet.Every iMac in the world has its own keyboard and mouse, but I now have to purchase a new keyboard and mouse for this one, which increases the cost of the system by about $200.

I never received the item as it was lost during shipping, so my review is on how the communication and refund was handled regarding the lost item.  I noticed on the UPS site that the item was scanned in on arrival at the destination city, but no further movement for over a day.  I reached out to UPS who said to file a claim the next day.  When I contacted OWC to let them know the package was most likely lost, they gave me the generic reply with how long shipping can take and to get back to them after that time had expired (about 2 weeks later).  This seemed like poor customer service as I had told them I had already spoken with UPS and they were pretty much agreeing the package was lost.  After an email or two, I seemed to be redirected to someone else who handled the rest of the communications.  I continued to provide updates to OWC from UPS and their replies were the only emails I received from them.  After letting them know I saw on UPS that a claim was provided to them a few days prior, I finally got an email saying my refund would be processed.  OWC could have reached out to me occasionally to provide updates or at least make it appear they were doing something.  Instead I was emailing my updates and hoping to hear something from them that gave me hope I would receive something.  Thus I'm only giving 3 stars.

Review.Titre: Fine service, charger only charges 3/4 time
Review.Contenu: No issues with shipping/delivery. Product was as ordered. However, the charger is slightly faulty. It generally works, but sometimes it disconnects and starts flashing and not charging. It's not bad enough to return, but it only charges about 3/4 of the time.

I thought it weird/unhelpful that during the online check out, I never saw a place to indicate that my purchase was a Christmas gift.Also . . .The refurbished iPad mini I purchased was still "registered" to a previous owner, which prevented the download of any app's or personalization of the iPad mini. Luckily my brother who's retired from CenturyLink (tech-knowledgeable) and an Apple Genius, was able to undo the previous registration and sync the iPad to the new users iPhone... but it even took him several tries and a couple hours.Was clearing any previous registration a step that was missed? Or a step that you should add to your refurbishing?

Purchased used IPAD. All buttons stick. I had to keep pressing the on/off button to get it to free up. The volume buttons up and down I need to press hard to get them to work. This is an issue my child (who I purchased this for has.

Review.Titre: Ordered a week ago and only notice i…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a week ago and only notice i have got from USPS tracking system is "Label Created, not yet in system"!Think that the packet has not left from your stock.

Bought an Apple Watch Series 7 from OWC. Received it only to find no charger included.  It was not made clear by OWC that no charger was included.  I can understand no wristband but no charger?  It makes no sense for you not to include a charger with something like this.  You include it with ipads and Macs?  Next time, include a charger.  Other places include chargers on Watches.  And it installs confidence that buyers are getting a good, reliable product!

The process was great and the support team was reachable and professional.  The quality of the computer was disappointing.  I have no issues with cosmetic things like discoloration or scratches on the case, even slow keys, but a large cluster of burned out pixels was very surprising.
Bought the wrong thing (single 8Gb stick, rather than two 4Gb sticks, which I'll attribute partially to my fault, but also partially to a confusing interface
Great products however... I chose 2 day shipping and it arrived in just over a week... one item was also incorrect so I can't reassemble my computer without waiting on another shipment.

Review.Titre: I liked the fact that I could talk to a…
Review.Contenu: I liked the fact that I could talk to a real staff member. I was not happy to find that the drive that I needed could not be identified until after I made a purchase of an internal ssd that would not perform on the same level as the ssd that it is replacing!!!!!! Now I have to consider the costs and benefits of shipping the drive back and incur international charges, pay more for a new drive and pay shipping back to Australia!!!!!

Review.Titre: Not a true Open Box item and I don't like being badgered for reviews - so 3
Review.Contenu: I got what I ordered and so far it seems to work - but in reality - is it truly an open box item if the SN# on the box Does NOT match the SN# on the enclosed item, doesn't that truthfully make it a USED/Refurbished product.  I paid for Open Box - But If you ask me I received a USED productAND.... I don't like being badgered for reviews - so 3

Review.Titre: I was able to order the product fine
Review.Contenu: I was able to order the product fine.  I’m getting delivery UPS ground, which I suspect is going to take several days.  I wasn’t given a date I can expect delivery.These are things online buyers expect- fast shipping and estimated delivery date.Update:  I don't want it to seem like I don't like MacSales (OWC).  I get their newsletters in the email and read every word and look at products they link to in the email.  They are a terrific company that I have ordered from a number of times in the past and I'm very satisfied with their products.I ordered on Sunday the 9th, my delivery date is Friday the 14th.  5 days isn't that bad (better than ordering anything from Apple!).  Amazon delivers overnight.
Pretty average, or what I consider what should be average. Clear instructions and well planned steps.

The overall experience was fine. I receive the memory and installed it. Had an issue with the system seeing all 64G of memory. I went online to find out that my particular MAC Pro will only handle 32G since it is a single processor. The page I found on your site said that my processor "Nehalem" was supported.

Review.Titre: Product is great but for some reason…
Review.Contenu: Product is great but for some reason they can’t merge guest orders with account.  So annoying so now I don’t have all my order history under my account

Review.Titre: Disappointed with change in pricing for memory config change of order.
Review.Contenu: Overall experience was good.  I was disappointed when I could not update my order before the build.  I was told updating the amount of memory cost would be over $750 when the price at configuration would have been $300.

Review.Titre: I had to call to get an update on my…
Review.Contenu: I had to call to get an update on my order as I never heard back from anyone on its status after 4 days even though I was charged on my credit card. The rep was kind and told me he was going to get back to me but he never did. I finally got a notice of shipment later on. I habe seen better customer service.

Review.Titre: Phone sales was great because Cart had difficulty loading the eclipse…
Review.Contenu: Cart had difficulty loading the eclipse along with the Mac through my cell phone to order and check out. . Had to call sales. But then Amanda of Sales got me through it and was wonderfully helpful and knowledgeable:

I ordered $9000 worth of computers & equipment and didn't hear anything back from OWC for about 3 days.  Called customer service & they said "Oh! It looks the order is waiting on customer service to get with about the availability of items."  It took for me to contact them in order for them to get back with me about my order.  Then every step of the way after that, I had to call them to get and update and some action.  And then, when I got the 2 iMacs, there was no keyboard and mouse which I couldn't find noted anywhere on the site.  I ended up purchasing two more computers off of Apple.com Refurbished store with better systems, customer service, and about the same prices. Do better OWC!

Review.Titre: Good shopping experience, poor after-sales service
Review.Contenu: Although it was a good shopping experience, I mistakenly ordered something I later realized I already had on hand.  I chatted with a CSR online, was assured that the item could be and was cancelled.  It shipped anyway and now I have something I don't need.

I wanted to buy an extended warranty for my Mac I bought from you guys. I’ve gotten a few emails saying do it before the date. So today I decided to do it. It processed and it said that you guys were excepting of my purchase. However, it was rejected online and said no product available for the warranty. Very very confusing!

I was on the phone with your rep for 10 mins, and he still sent my the wrong required items.  My external Guardian MAXimus mini drive requires (2) 2.5 inch HD's, the rep sent 3.5 inch.  OWC sold me this RAID drive.  When communicating, it is best to "Not be Misunderstood".  He could have said, "Let me just confirm the drive you have, so I can check the HD's it accepts.  However, it is an older drive that OWC I believe no longer sells, and some of the employees are newer, and may have started after the the drive was discontinued.  Keeping employees aware of past / discounted products may help.  I am adding 2 stars because of the quick and easy correction of the error.

Box did not include instructions. Used step by step video on YouTube. The video unfortunately was not as clear on the reinstallation which ended up damaging the inside of my Mac and now I won’t be able to use my iMac at all now.

The checkout is atrocious.  It should tell me about the address and shipping separation up front.  I also have not received the confirmation in my email although I have screenshot it on “p 4” of the checkout.  The checkout never says “OK YOU ARE DONE NOW”. And it should

Review.Titre: I only give 3 stars because the 5th…
Review.Contenu: I only give 3 stars because the 5th generation iPod battery that I ordered through OWC unfortunately did not work.  Saying this was not necessarily OWC's fault because I do not know if my old iPod might have a problem or not?  The original battery died on me many years ago but it does still work when plugged into the AC wall plug.  I did call tech support and Evan was very good at answering my question and I think overall OWC is a good outfit at what they do and seems very organized and wanting to please their customers.  I had the same problem when I had ordered another battery replacement years ago and had the same problem of not being able to hook up to my computer iTunes since the battery was non-functional.  I really wanted my old iPod to work like it is suppose to but with no battery just have to live with what currently is on the iPod hard drive.

RMA process is pretty vague. Sent in an SSD that I thought had failed after two years (warranted for 5) with the RMA #. Once received, they sent a shipping notice with no additional info. Turns out they sent me back the same drive (verified by serial #). No note. Nothing. Chatted with customer support who while nice, were very slow to reply. Said they’d have tech support reach out and contact me. That didn't happen, so after a day I reached out to tech support directly. They helped me diagnose the problem quickly and I was able to fix everything during the chat.  While everything worked out in the end, the communication as to how the process works, and updates along the way were seriously lacking.

The item description could have been more precise.  I have defective version of the same pci card and used it to compare to the picture of the the pci card on your internet page, just to be sure I knew what I was buying.

Review.Titre: Your website on iOS browsers would NOT…
Review.Contenu: Your website on iOS browsers would NOT let me alter the number of items I wanted. I had to go through a primitive method of choosing what I wanted. I almost gave up due to the time wasted. I'm normally a big fan of OWC, but not this experience.

This is probably not an OWC systems issue - I was expecting to have more information from UPS about the status of my delivery. The package has still not been delivered to me despite being notified that it was projected to be delivered on March 24, and I stayed home that day. I could not get more information about the status of my delivery from UPS or USPS, who had not yet taken delivery from UPS. Still waiting, patiently, but disappointed in the UPS/USPS connection

The representative was as nice as possible and he tried to help me which I appreciate. However, I still have no computer.I think a new one should’ve been shipped to me and the “where is it?” Game with ups shouldn’t be my problem
Ease of purchase.  However, item was on back order and they did not let me know at the time of purchase but days after.  I'm very disappointed.  They should know inventory quantities.

I recently purchased a Thunderbolt Dock from OWC.  On the US site there was a coupon that lowered the price of the dock by 20% (a signifiant amount!).  For some reason the coupon didn't apply to the Canadian site. (I even asked about it in the chat and they weren't able to apply it).  Since the US OWC site ships to Canada I still ordered the dock, but it cost me an extra $50CDN due to having to pay for shipping (shipping would have been free from the CDN site).  Kind of annoying that the coupon only applied to the US site.  Haven't tried to dock yet.

Review.Titre: Aside from the mess with you canceling…
Review.Contenu: Aside from the mess with you canceling my order and not telling me, I eventually got a cable that was not the one I needed.  It would have been possible to know this in advance if you would have shown it clearly, end on, in your advertising. Few people are experts in the history of connector progression.

Review.Titre: I have an older Thunderbolt Bay 4 which…
Review.Contenu: I have an older Thunderbolt Bay 4 which I was looking to upgrade. The suggestions I got from the Tech person seem to be limited.  It was my thoughts that he responded to where as I wanted his thoughts on what would be the best upgrade.  I got an SSD drive and it's working.  I not sure this makes any sense, but I just wanted the best upgrade possible that OWC could provide.

Review.Titre: I bought a thunderbolt hub on their…
Review.Contenu: I bought a thunderbolt hub on their website. During the check out process I selected Next Day Air. The website indicated it would arrive on Saturday but that was incorrect. When the thunderbolt hub arrived I had problems within a week. I notice my Mac would have a warning to not unplug drives without ejecting. But I would check and the drives were still connected via the hub. I think it did this when I was away from the KB and the warning was just still on my screen. I tried to contact their support but due to time of day (my work schedule, 12 hour shifts and being on West Coast) I could only ever email them. I never received a reply. The problem would happen intermittently and then it stopped being a problem. I tried 2 emails. Then suddenly the hub stopped working. the power supply just will chirp. I tried to email again to support, was closed, tried customer service, took 2 requests for a RMA before anyone followed through. I would like either paid return or a refund at this point. Each rep I spoke to made me angrier. At first I was ready to pay to return, the second rep made me so I angry I wanted a refund, the supervisor he passed me onto made me angry enough to write a negative review.---10/18edit: They did finally reach out with help. I changed the review score as such because I sent the item back to them and I will asset further when it is resolved.

Review.Titre: When shipping costs to Canada are more…
Review.Contenu: When shipping costs to Canada are more that the cost of the item I want to buy, I buy it from another vendor. Shipping small items USPS & Canada post doesn't cost hundreds of dollars. I would have bought other things, but the shipping cost made it not worth it.

Review.Titre: Some form of insight on how to deal w/…
Review.Contenu: Some form of insight on how to deal w/ legacy Macintosh CDs would be greatly appreciated as a support item.The software reccos were helpful.

After ordering when I went back to the site to look at the model for the thunderbolt dock, it showed no longer available. When I looked at the model number it turns out it’s a used item. I didn’t realize that was buying a used product. OWCTB4DOCKU

Review.Titre: I always have a great experience…
Review.Contenu: I always have a great experience shopping here. There were only minor issues with choosing but I suspect it was because everything was selling out as we went along.

Review.Titre: Great products and prices but difficult to place order.The wide
Review.Contenu: The wide offering of Mac products and your great prices are terrific. Perhaps because I was tired, your checkout procedure was somewhat confusing and took longer than most online companies I deal with.

Review.Titre: Using the mac sales web site was easy
Review.Contenu: Using the mac sales web site was easy.  However, initially we did have a bit of confusion understanding the configuration tabs.Pricing was simple to understand.

Review.Titre: I have found OWC to be very dependable…
Review.Contenu: I have found OWC to be very dependable -- purchased two computers from them recently and lots of other minor electronics over many years. Only issue is reduction of $20 the day after black Friday! Apple refurbished Macbook Pro arrived on time and as advertised.

Review.Titre: Jumped the gun on review request
Review.Contenu: Prices were great, arrival was as expected.  All my past purchases from OWC have met expectations.  What I did not like was getting a request for a review the moment I submitted my order.  How can I rate delivery, quality, etc. when I've just barely paid for it, and delivery is still days away?  Review request should NOT be delivered before ordered items, at the least, arrive in buyer's hands.

The item I wanted was in stock and at a reasonable price. It shipped and was received quickly. The only problem is that I had to make special arrangements to receive it due to the signature required. I was disallowed a request for a UPS store pickup in lieu of waiting to give the delivery driver a signature.

The site is user friendly. And the items price for sale are reasonable. All my current needs for mac products are available at this online shopping site.I'm so eager to receive my first order and planned to place my next order soon....

Good product, good prices. Orders promptly filled. Shipping service provider could be improved. UPS Surepost is the "free" option. IMHO Surepost is inferior. This service is where UPS delivers to your US Post Office and turns it over the them for final delivery. I've lost track of the shipments that have been returned to sender due to insufficient shipping address labeling. UPS needs to "grow up" and accept a PO Box for a delivery address.

Review.Titre: First I found what I wanted at a price…
Review.Contenu: First I found what I wanted at a price point I liked! I did spend a little more time configuring and purchasing than I expected (due to operator error or store glitches) but eventually got what I was looking for. The glitch occurred while configuring a Mac Mini memory configuration. I somehow ended up with a choice of 16 or 32 gig costing the same - so I took the 32 gig!

Review.Titre: Monitor is great and like new
Review.Contenu: Monitor is great and like new. Came very fast. As others complained, did not some with power cord which is why I am giving 4 stars. Did need to purchase the appropriate adapter which I expected.

Review.Titre: Great SDXC card, but it isn't gasoline!
Review.Contenu: These are the best SD cards I have found. As fast as any, and nearly as sturdy as the Sony Tough cards without the thickness compatibility issues.So I ordered some additional SDXC cards on their "hurry, ends soon" Black Friday sale only to have them drop even further in price two days later... I am a longtime customer (personal and corporate), and was a bit miffed. But OWC customer service is refunding the difference, so good on them!

Prices OK. It appeared that there was less on sale than last year - was hoping for discounts on newer products.OWC website did not overtly mention sale - had to go to macsalesHad some issues with Safari and being told - after Paypal went through - that cart had been changed - please review. Had to go to Firefox and reenter my order manuallyI was worried about Paypal being charged 4 times - does not appear to have happenedI am also waiting on info regarding thunderbladeI have been a customer for 30 years - under different emails and plan to continue our relationshipI declined to leave a review last night as my use of an old browser may have been partly to blame - cookie issuesI would consider having patrons confirm cart and shipping before Paypal
Only one complaint, had to loop back to use PayPal on final order page. All else great as usual!

Review.Titre: OWC is the best store for all your Apple needs.
Review.Contenu: Everyone knows technology is expensive. When it comes to laptops, that expense can be astronomically high. After spilling water on my MacBook Pro, early 2015 model the case, and the battery itself began to expand. So my batteries for the laptop were expanding to the point they could’ve exploded and so the battery had to be replaced.Yes, in the 90s I took apart a lot of Microsoft windows computers. I had Denver taken apart an apple device. I’ve never even taken apart a laptop, but I needed to replace those batteries and get the outer shell seated more optimally with the remaining screws.OWC allowed me that is in permission but as in provided to me information about what I needed and how to replace the laptop battery. And since I had always found the items at OWC were priced either appropriately or just really great sales. Because of that trust I then decided to purchase a new laptop battery from OWC.The early 2015, MacBook Pro is now humming along without any issues.OWC is the place for all your Apple needs. Great staff Great priced. Great products.

Review.Titre: Protection Plan Details Hard to Find
Review.Contenu: I tried to find more details on the PLUS protection plan option but couldn't find details anywhere. I also thought I saw an option for Apple Care + for $40 when viewing the item the night before, but couldn't find that the next day either.

Review.Titre: Web site has good descriptions on the…
Review.Contenu: Web site has good descriptions on the products offered.  Checkout process was smooth

I've been using OWC drives for over 10yrs. I recently  needed to upgrade a MacPro desktop to a newer unit.My only criticism  would be that the sales dept could've recommended a newer iMac pro instead. I was a bit driven to keep a desktop, but later realized I could've had more power, speed but a bit less expandable unit.Everyone at the Tech support line was Super helpful and patient. I give Tech support people 20 stars!!!

Review.Titre: I couldn't get the monitors to connect
Review.Contenu: I couldn't get the monitors to connect. I contacted support who informed me I need software download. They emailed me info with instructions. It took a few moments. Wish they included software during purchase.

Thumbs up! we've been using the MacBook Pro 2017!had used my backups for mac OS High Sierra & Mojave, they seem to work well just not sure about using the fingerprint thing or the buying stuff for now..all works well although it's 6 years old, but that's what I asked for.. thanks again, LL
I like the quality and number of Mac Mini Accessories.

Review.Titre: Always responsive and pleasant to deal…
Review.Contenu: Always responsive and pleasant to deal with. I've used this company for many years. Unfortunately, the order provision was incomplete and I had to pay for completion. It was a small addition but should have been provided free, imo.
Accidentally got matching phone and watch. Happy with these. I thought the Macally 3 in 1 charger was supposed to be free. Waste of money.

Review.Titre: My order shipped quickly and I like the…
Review.Contenu: My order shipped quickly and I like the product.The missing star is because the card inviting me to documentation leads to the sales page not to the page with that information.  Even this would be ok, but there should at least be a link on that page to the further information.  I did manage to wander through the support part of the site and find the information, just not as quickly as I would wish.  Still, if that's all I have to complain about...
The surprise discount of $20 motivated the sale. When I went looking for an SSD to put inside, your prices were much higher than the current market, so I took a pass on them

Review.Titre: There were no problems on your site
Review.Contenu: There were no problems on your site. Everything wentsmoothly and navigating was easy and I found what I wanted.
Lots of product, lots of variations. While it is somewhat difficult to compare units — I made my own spreadsheet — the information provided is very full and detailed.

Very smooth, easy purchase.  If I had any reservations it was next time not using the free shipping.  It's that hybrid USPS / UPS crap that has deplorable tracking and is slow.  Other than that,  the MacBook looked like new.  It loaded up Mac OS 14 no problem.

Review.Titre: The ordering process went well and item…
Review.Contenu: The ordering process went well and item was received quickly. Item will be given as Christmas gift
Everything went smoothly except when I went to add a new shipping address, I had problems getting the program to except the changes, a bit frustrating.

The RAM works well.  Happy to report that OWC's tests were correct, and that all 48GB are functional on my '09 machine, allowing me to shirk planned obsolescence for a while longer. So glad this is still available! Overall, I'm very satisfied.(The shipping was a bit of an issue. The overnight shipping was, I suppose, correct if we're talking business days. I ordered on Sunday and received the RAM Tuesday. But there was no indication that the order was actually processed, when I would actually recieve it, or that it'd been sent out for delivery.  Ended up on the phone (with a super helpful guy from IL named Jonathan) for a while, and after a few hours, he finally was able to figure out that it had been shipped. So, great! But kind of a waste of my time. And his.)

Review.Titre: Good product good price great service…
Review.Contenu: Good product good price great service fast shipping but,,, the 512gb ssd was a bit too wide to fit the late 2017 model MacBook Air 7,2 without clashing with the battery. I’m still trying to size other drives from other vendors to see if they match the width of the original 128gb drive.The oem 512gb is slightly wider . Need to pick up an external case from you guys also.

The product was of exceptional value.  The warranty was not.  I was hounded to sign up for an extended warranty which I did.  When the screen cracked on the laptop I was informed it is not covered.  No refunds from the warranty even though the computer is no longer usable (the coverage lasted a total of 1 day)Update:  OWC has reached out and refunded my extended warranty cost and clarified the extent of coverage on the warranty (screens are not covered if broken read the small print).  Machine is not repairable (old 2013 macbook pro) too bad it was a good laptop.

Scant ( read: no ) setup information in repackaging. For some, that can be daunting. I just pushed through like I always do. Out of the box, the unit looks for connection and unsurprisingly states "I'm have trouble connecting to the internet ( or router, whatever...)". Best workaround is to hang it off of your Mac ( PC? idk ), and reset it there. Home app on your phone, add it there. Keep at it, you'll win eventually.
Delivery is on time, but the package was unsealed.The items inside were all good, not missing any.

Review.Titre: Great Shop Site for Mac Users
Review.Contenu: This guys not just sell you a product, they Have helpful videos to show you and explain how to make the parts replacements and thats great.

Review.Titre: Free Shipping needs to clearly state SurePost
Review.Contenu: Free Shipping needs to clearly state, “UPS SurePost”.  You seem to ignore the fact that there are backwards towns like this where UPS and FedEx deliver to an address but USPS refuses to do so.  So dropping a package addressed to my home does absolutely nothing but guarantee a returned package.  Fortunately, Inwas able to intercept the package.  Your customer service rep could not do anything about this and in fact I had to explain it four times.  Want the transcript, I certainly have it.

Intrinsically built reputable pillar of trust !Selling second-hand equipment. Essentially relies on public recognition of how you apply effort into ensuring success for two points.1. Customer belief in your integrity ,     not to swindle them.2. Your own continued business health's growth ability.You do not need to agree / disagree with my stated personal opinion.The only detriment for me personally is the added "tax" due to sales item shipping costs from America to Thailand. (My chosen retirement home-land.)Kindest regards,JJ (John Flintoft)

Review.Titre: OWC is my go-to brand for Apple…
Review.Contenu: OWC is my go-to brand for Apple peripherals. I've never been disappointed by the quality of the goods, nor by the service in those rare instances where service was necessary.
I had some issues/questions, and the tech support team answered them in a helpful way. I purchased the Gemini RAID backup.

Review.Titre: The drive is flawless and fast!
Review.Contenu: The drive is flawless and fast!  Installation was easy but tedious.  Please watch the installation video BEFORE installing the drive.  My only issue and I'm not sure it's an issue is that putting the display panel back onto the iMac is almost impossible for one person to do.  You only get one shot at perfecting the alignment before laying it down onto the tape.  I've done this before and I get it very close but it's never perfectly lined up and I do have a small gap on the bottom of the panel.  It would probably be easier if you had a friend to help align it just before laying it in place.

I had (?) an online account, at least I thought so. Other than that account apparently not existing, my experience was pretty swell. I am excited to get the equipment I ordered since it will help declutter our dining room.

Review.Titre: I ordered an Apple Watch series 8…
Review.Contenu: I ordered an Apple Watch series 8 stainless steel.It arrived one full week later since I opted for free postage. This is really too long. The item stayed at our local UPS site for three days before going to USPS for delivery. I will not order from OWC again using this delivery method.

Great product, Aura SSD card. Seems to have made a difference. However, installation not as easy as described. Maybe include a pair of plastic tweezers to hold very, very small screws in place while trying to screw them in? Took me several frustrating attempts but finally got in place. Otherwise would have been 5 stars.
Great options, but it would be awesome if I could fine-tune the filter for how much RAM or storage I'm looking for as well.

Overall a great MacBook Pro with a lot of power and multiple upgrades at a great price. Some cosmetic issues such as the faint image of an old sticker on the top lid and one small area on the screen that's barely noticeable most of the time. Ordering was simple and straightforward, shipping was quick and item arrived well packaged and secure. I'd certainly buy from again but hope this MacBook lasts me years!

The product (MBP battery) arrived fast.  I followed the calibration instructions.  Battery is working flawlessly.I gave this review 4 stars because of the glip I had w/CR.  She kept telling me I HAD to have an account to make a purchase.  Advised her website did not state this.  Plus I advised her I do not "online" purchase, reason for the "phone call" to purchase.  I then asked for her supervisor, otherwise will shop someplace else.  She immediately put my order through.

Review.Titre: The purchase process is a little messy
Review.Contenu: The purchase process is a little messy. The form asked me for the address (not specifying that this is a billing address) and then, in the end, asked if my delivery address was the same as a billing address. I had to refill the form all over again. I am unsure about the delivery time because I did not get the item yet.
the fact that the item i ordered worked on my first try installation,the last time i bought it , it would not fit and i just had to return it and try again

Prompt and as-described. The only down-side was that the refurbished MacBook Pro was "space grey" color, and the included power cable was not. As it turned out, the power cable was defective (a common known issue) and since the computer was still under warranty from Apple, I exchanged it for a new one at the Apple Store for no cost, and they gave me a "space grey" one.

Review.Titre: Great product and instructions. Screw drivers weak material.
Review.Contenu: The website was easy to navigate and identify the components appropriate for my specific device. The products arrived promptly, packaged well and appears to be of a high quality design and build.I needed the SSD install kit which included the micro drivers to disassemble the computer case and to remove the screw holding the SSD. These drivers are built of weak materials and the driver head stripped (rounded off the star points) very easily.I was able to file the tip shorter, to remove the rounded tip and expose an unmarred portion fo the driver tip.

It generally went smoothly, although a glitch (which may well have been mine) resulted in one part of the order being duplicated, so that now I have two of everything in the order. That's OK, though, I can use all of the equipment in both orders.

Review.Titre: I have always had a good experience…
Review.Contenu: I have always had a good experience with OWC. The site has been pretty consistent over time, and I appreciate, at my age(74). If the product I ordered lives up to past purchases, this can be a 5 star review. The website is easy to maneuver around, works like it should.

Review.Titre: It’s been 2 days since my purchase and…
Review.Contenu: Original review: “It’s been 2 days since my purchase and I can’t access the order status. It says that it’s unable to find my order.”Ok, my bad. I wasn’t in the Canadian website, that’s why the order didn’t exist. In my defense, I was using the direct link I got in an email, but didn’t see that I had to change countries. Now just waiting for the order to update and ship!

The product, shipping, and packaging were excellent.  Instructions were good except they don't cover the case where the battery is so old it was drained to 0% and the Mac wouldn't boot from it until it was charged to 5%, but everything went fine after that.

Same day shipped, a fast free delivery is awesome. Some of plastic air tubes of my protection packaging were damaged. Although it might had happened during the transportation. The charger had no any protection cover. Overall, thanks for your job. Looking forward to having next purchasing with better packaging.

What was good about this order was that it arrived as specified and was exactly what I had ordered. The ordering process was simple which made it easy to follow and ensure that the product and everything entailed were correct.

Review.Titre: Website could be a bit more straight forward.
Review.Contenu: Website could be a bit more straight forward. Navigation is a bit kludgy, but not impossible. Maybe the site has grown "organically" and just needs a bit of optimization from the user point of view. Great videos. Very clear. Good pricing. You guys have always been reliable and always "there" when I needed.

Review.Titre: I purchased a used Mac Pro rated as in…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a used Mac Pro rated as in good condition. There were 4 levels off condition options available at different price levels, used, good used, VGC and mint.  I ordered the good used item, and was very please to discover that the item delivered was in my view very close to mint condition. The display I also ordered was the poorer of the 2 conditions on offer. It shows some signs of abuse on the upper surface of the base and some scratches in non visible areas of the case, basically as expected. The equipment appears to be working well.My only grumble and hence the 4 star rating is that I wasn't provided with a tracking number and didn't receive any notification that the order had shipped.  I did manage to find the tracking number by checking the status on the companies web site, just felt I should have been sent that information.

Review.Titre: Refreshed my mid-2014 Macbook which a much bigger & faster SSD
Review.Contenu: Everything was smooth with this transaction. Well my battery expanded when I removed the back cover but that's another story. I did have a problem removing the screw from SSD using the torque driver. I'm not sure if it was because the screw was in there too tight originally OR the torque driver wasn't the best quality. I took it to a repair shop and thankfully they got the screw out without having to use a dremel (Yikes). Now I can download ALL the Garageband library and do some FCPX work without always having to be concerned with space (and speed).  But overall I'm happy with this vendor and I would recommend them.

Computer arrived before promised date. Would have chosen an older (faster) operating system if I could. Worked perfectly out of the box (great packaging!). Really liked your old rocket newsletter. I miss it.

Courteous and helpful sales reps. Unfortunately, they got my name and address wrong so that lead to some hassle. However, the person who helped me correct the problem was helpful and pleasant. Overall a good experience in the end. Haven't received the item yet so can't comment on that, but would use them again. Next time will double check that they have the spelling and numbers correct.

Review.Titre: Too soon to comment on experience
Review.Contenu: Without completing delivery, I’m not sure why OWC would ask this question so soon. Order was just placed this AM.

Review.Titre: Buying a replacement battery for my…
Review.Contenu: Buying a replacement battery for my mid-2010 MacBook Pro 17" was pretty smooth, but when I wanted to look for "something else" to get along, I just didn't find anything small and inexpensive to pick my interest. I thought about a keyboard silicone cover for my 2020 M1 Macbook Air, but the colors were just not very appealing, for a guy with a rose Gold one anyhow.

The product was in great working condition but I could tell it was definitely used.  I wish there had been more transparency on the fact the product was not new and would ship in a different box than the manufacturing

Review.Titre: Envoy Pro Mini good hardware poor setup
Review.Contenu: Envoy Pro Mini arrived in good condition and met its description. My initial attempt to use it with USB-c iPad was unsuccessful. I got additional instructions from a very helpful support agent. After following his additional suggestions I was still unable to locate the drive on my iPad which I finally realized required an app to be used with the iPad. Hardware good but the directions for using it with iPad or iPhone needs updating.

Great used MacBook Air. I received my used MacBook Air ahead of schedule. It's nicer than I expected. The only problem I had was the operating system would not support Apple Pages. After a live chat and a call to customer service, I found out I had to upload a newer operating system that supported Pages. Why didn't OWC load the latest system into the unit before it left? I spent a couple of hours figuring out and resolving the issue. I'm a pretty intelligent guy but far from a techie. I think sometimes the tech guys get caught in their 'techie bubble' and think, 'Duh,' everybody knows that.  This is the reason for four stars instead of five. Great company. I'll be back.

Very happy with product and with extra storage space there is plenty of room for saved items.The only thing I found was the right hand side fwd upper and lower edge of laptop was slightly crushed in like it had been dropped on corner edge .Other than that there was no other marks on it.

Review.Titre: My laptop arrived on time with UPS shipping…
Review.Contenu: My laptop arrived on time with shipping UPS in the 4 day claim, Unit condition is excellent with one serious downside, OS 10.13 is so old there is no internal upgrade path to a later OS and and while it is functional I can't use it for my needs. My work around is to boot from my Montery OS 12.6 SSD backup from my Macbook Pro. I am considering cloning that version to the internal drive  however it is now functional to my needs.

3 Extra USB-C ports do help.The box itself is smail than I thought it would be, and the power connection is robust.  It's not really what I thought I was ordering, but it works well, and I'm keeping it.

Review.Titre: Shipment arrived on time and the items…
Review.Contenu: Shipment arrived on time and the items I got were the items I ordered, in excellent condition as advertised. Did I expect to buy a used computer display device without a power cord? No, I did not. But I have to admit, the company did not promise me one. All that was promised was the monitor. The picture of the display showed what appeared to me to be two cords hanging down from it. I figured one was power and one was for video signal. In reality it was a video connection with an attached cord for charging a laptop. Oh, and in looking at power cords sold separately by this company, I did not find they carry what's required to power this device. I am simply fortunate I had the proper spec power cord just lying around, or else I bought an expensive paperweight.

Review.Titre: Took a while to find the payment…
Review.Contenu: Took a while to find the payment location so I could check out but once there it was ok

Super amazing products and supporting technical information. Hard to find what was in stock for a quick need. Can make user experience better when helping customers know delivery dates and what is in stock without going through the purchase process to find out.

The installation videos and pdfs were so helpful to me as I swapped out SSD memory on my older MacAir.  It was a little rocky to get it up and running again, but patience and attention to the steps given allowed me to accomplish this.The T5 and T6 screwdrivers stripped right away and fortunately I had a sturdier set to be able to use.

Ordered next day delivery, now it's arriving NOT next day but Monday.  I need this for the week for work and since I travel work I won't get it until next Saturday. Come on guys I know there is availability for Saturday delivery.  You should add that as an option!!
Prompt shipping, excellent item at a great price

Review.Titre: Would have been 5 stars had it not been…
Review.Contenu: Would have been 5 stars had it not been for the fact that they never sent me an email when it was sent! Also my purchase order # could not be found through the website.But having said that my email sent through Amazon asking what was the problem was answered within an hour saying it had been sent.

I contacted customer service with a question about a Mac mini ssd upgrade kit, and they answered my questions. I was worried about needing an original apple ssd for the upgrade, but it turned out mine didn’t need it to work. Including the specific tools needed with the kit is awesome, though the video on the kit’s web page is not the one for this upgrade. I had to search a little to find it again. But that you have everything needed to make these upgrades possible and doable is awesome.

The only thing negative I can say - and it might not be the fault of OWC - is that I don't remember the product described as either refurbished or a return resale, which I tend to guess it was because 1) the box wasn't shrinkwrapped, 2) it was missing its charging cord and 3) there was no printed Apple literature with it, no statement of warranty, etc.That being said, I didn't need any of those things. I was replacing my old keyboard and still had the charging cord from that.I was very impressed with the shipping speed and price. I paid for UPS Next Day Air, and the product was delivered about 14 hours later, shipped from Illinois to New Hampshire. I was very pleased with that.

Review.Titre: So far order received as per advised
Review.Contenu: So far order received as per advised. Have not yet installed the battery so I can’t say if it’s correct as I my tech guy will be installing it. I presume they sent the correct battery based on my type of laptop so fingers crossed! Customer service I have no complaints!

Review.Titre: Purchasing a product is quick and easy…
Review.Contenu: Purchasing a product is quick and easy the website information is clear to understand and Customer support when needed are very friendly professional and efficient I'm a long time customer and will continue to purchase from OWC.com macsales.com. High-quality products a great selection for all your computer and tech needs.
Great site, exceptional products! If you added apple pay, site would be 5 star. thanks so much!
Macsales did everything right except using UPS.

The chat response was helpful. My only suggestion is to make the experience more friendly with more resources for less tech savvy individuals who may make a laptop purchase only once every four years or so. It was difficult ferreting out the proper choice based on compatibility and upgradability. Thank you

Good merchandise. Everything wirks as expected. Delivery was fast. The only issue: tool kit misses 2 items: sim tray pin and suction cap. I particularly needed suction cap, so this was a bummer. But I worked it around.
Ordered the apple magic keyboard with numeric pad.  The experience, once again, was a good one.  Easy to order and delivery was pretty quick.  Only wish it came with charging cable.

Excellent products. Shipping not the best. Need to contract with UPS or FedX for two day free shipping on all orders. That would be on par with the rest of OWC business model. Also keep sales/customer svc on shore please.
parallels desktop is demanding a 25 figure activation key.  i see no such key on the invoice and no such key at your websightJUST SEND THE HARDWARE

Product and information are good, however small pieces of information are missing regarding install procedure. Access to disposal information would also be incredibly helpful. I suspect people are more likely to improperly dispose of parts if the information isn’t easily accessible. Lastly a brief video, for less knowledgeable people, regarding ESD safe practices should be offered, rather than saying “follow safe ESD practices” and then not provide any info.

Review.Titre: Verify everything before committing to the sale
Review.Contenu: The refurbished MacBook Pro arrived quickly, and is in good condition. However, I was assured that it would have an older OS on it so I can run 32-bit software, and it doesn’t have the older OS. Now I have to take extra time to have a service center do a reinstall. 🤨

Review.Titre: The only issue that bothered me was…
Review.Contenu: The only issue that bothered me was that I bought a used iMac that is over 4 years old, paid over 2K for it and they didn't include a keyboard or mouse.  Yeah they said they won't, but when you pay that much, they should my opinion.

Review.Titre: OWC has always delivered good products on time.
Review.Contenu: My Elite mini was delivered early and in very good condition. My only problem was that insufficient instructions for formatting were included.

Review.Titre: Shipment speed is not as advertised
Review.Contenu: The item, an SSD, was advertised as "ships the same day". I ordered late night on Aug 27 and paid for overnight air shipment. It was supposed to ship on Aug 28 and arrive on Aug 29. But it was shipped on Aug 30 (delay of two days) and was delivered on Sep 5 (delay of seven days). I've reached out to the customer support and they've refunded the shipment fee.The SSD itself works fine.
The sales representative said that the used Apple Watch I bought included a charging cable. It didn't.

Review.Titre: Dinged one star for not informing me…
Review.Contenu: Dinged one star for not informing me that the "PO No." field has a maximum size of 32 characters (until I unwittingly violated the rule).• Warn me of this in advance.• Better: don't limit the size of the field

Review.Titre: Great place to find Apple products
Review.Contenu: Great place to find Apple products that are older than the newer and better. I am not a fan of the newer and better. If it isn’t broke then stop fixing it. Apple has fixed themselves into a corner for me. At Mac Sales I can usually find what I need.

I was looking for something not "intuitively obvious to the casual observer" and I had not found it on your site.  I went on Live Chat and very quickly got a tech.  While he was researching my need I thought, "I wonder if it might be..." And found it fairly quickly, although your search engine didn't find it for me.  The tech found it at the same time I did.
Web site is informative. The items I may purchase has a comparability list of Mac computers that would fit that item and made my decision easier whether or not to make that purchase.

Review.Titre: You had what I needed in stock at semi…
Review.Contenu: You had what I needed in stock at semi reasonable Price. Your Website Orders need to include Orders payed by Paypal

Products shipped in a timely fashion.  Battery seems to work well so far, will get more testing soon.  The SSD hasn't been installed yet.  No how-to or link in the shipment, assume that can be looked up on the MacSales website.

Review.Titre: Items purchased were at a great price!
Review.Contenu: Items purchased were at a great price!I was also reminded that the items were in my cart- I was busy and got distracted.Selections are always there.Thank-you

Mike and others with whom I spoke were tremendously helpful as well as patient.  I had browser problems preventing me from logging in. Mike suggested using google chrome.  Mike was very knowledgeable about the  ordering process. He readily confirmed that my order for a one-left-only Mac computer "had my name on it" and that the order took a few days to process owing to some optional upgrades I made.  Shortly after I spoke with him, I got my 1st email from OWC with License number, etc., for my 1 yr subscription to Parallels.  He was easy to talk with and congenial.  Great service!

Great description of item.  Allowing Apple Pay made this transaction very easy and quick.  I am always disappointed at the cost of shipping, but the value of the products sold overcome that disappointment.  Many thanks to this seller.

Review.Titre: I received everything I needed to…
Review.Contenu: I received everything I needed to replace the battery on the Macbook Pro.The only thing that would have given me more confidence would have been a serial number lookup - so I made sure I bought the correct battery upgrade.  When I ordered battery replacement, I only had a photo of the serial number on the outside of the MBP.You are my goto place for Mac parts.David Peterson - Servicing computers since 1980, laptops since 1989.

Review.Titre: Battery charged up and is working  as expected
Review.Contenu: Followed the directions to install and condition the battery. Seems to be working. Went with Mac sales because of prior purchases working out well. Also, I didn't want to just buy a battery from a random no name brand company that might explode or not work as advertised.

I am always very satisfied with my purchases from OWC. The only time I ever get a little bugged down is sometimes trying to find something that is not an obvious major item. Like today, looking for an enclosure for a naked hard drive. I had to go to the hard drive section and then Choose one and then found the option for a naked drive enclosure. But that’s nitpicking.
This website is easy to use and has great products at great prices.  I’ve purchased from them several times and it’s always been a good experience.  I definitely recommend them.

Your website is very easy to navigate. Whatever I'm looking for is found quickly.Checkout is stupid fast (I have an account).Shipping is usually quicker than promised when it ships from Las VegasPrices are always competitive.

Review.Titre: Thank you with Hugs. OWC is my saviour
Review.Contenu: I have already purchased several iMac and MacbookPro products from OWC, Prices are reasonable and the Items were super(memory/disk were working exceptionally and more than I expected = in my words it is super quality), except the shipping charges sometimes exceed the items if there is a way for cheap transportation hope Sri Lankan People benefit lot from it. The younger generation now uses more Apple Products. I am one of the moderators who run more than 10k Apple users in FB maclk group.  They were getting caught to crap all the time and destroying their Apple products.  Your attention is expected

Review.Titre: I have always had good service and fast…
Review.Contenu: I have always had good service and fast shipping. Products, reman and new have always been as described and reasonable.My latest order came through before expectations! Much faster than expected and spot on!

Review.Titre: OWC provide quality products at fair…
Review.Contenu: OWC provide quality products at fair prices. Ease of finding, selecting and purchasing through their site was stellar.
